title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: We know that we're trying to determine x such that $$x=\log_{9}\left(81\right)$$. Rewrite this expression first into exponential form.

title: Determing the Exponential Form
text: What is the exponential form of $$\log_{9}\left(81\right)=x$$?

title: Rewrite 81 in terms of 9
text: How can we rewrite 81 in terms of powers of 9?

title: Solve for x
text: Substitution $$9^2$$ into the exponential equation we found before, we get $$9^x=9^2$$. What is x?
